attributes.action: award Gareth Malone, conductor and t.v. presenter an Honour in recognition of his inspirational work uniting communities through choir singing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gareth Malone has been an evangelist for choir participation in successive BBC television series, assembling, coaching and motivating a variety of once unlikely  singing groups and sharing the journey as they overcome their inhibition, discover their ability, realise their power to enthrall an audience. In the process, we see their communities re-inspired and we are reminded what might be possible within our own.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
